mapper.update: update t_exp_decorate_voucher set name=#{name}, title=#{title}, price=#{price}, use_price=#{usePrice}, type=#{type}, state=#{state}, validity_day=#{validityDay}, update_time=now(), vouche_url=#{voucheUrl}, content=#{content} where id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert t_exp_decorate_voucher ( name, title, price, use_price, type, state, validity_day, create_user, create_time, update_time, vouche_url, content ) values( #{name}, #{title}, #{price}, #{usePrice}, #{type}, #{state}, #{validityDay}, #{createUser}, now(), now(), #{voucheUrl}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.`name`, t.price, t.use_price, t.type, t.state, t.validity_day, date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, date_format(t.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_time, t.vouche_url, t.content FROM t_exp_decorate_voucher t WHERE 1 = 1
